description: Adds one or more tags (keys and values) to an application, campaign, message template, or segment.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

parameters.name: TagsModel
parameters.description: Specifies the tags (keys and values) for an application, campaign, message template, or segment. A string-to-string map of key-value pairs that defines the tags for an application, campaign, message template, or segment. Each of these resources can have a maximum of 50 tags. Each tag consists of a required tag key and an associated tag value. The maximum length of a tag key is 128 characters. The maximum length of a tag value is 256 characters. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: A string-to-string map of key-value pairs that defines the tags for an application, campaign, message template, or segment. Each of these resources can have a maximum of 50 tags. Each tag consists of a required tag key and an associated tag value. The maximum length of a tag key is 128 characters. The maximum length of a tag value is 256 characters.
